attributes.action: increase the sentence given to sex offenders, and to tag all offenders on release
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sex offenders are preditors, on release a number of them will reoffend but to protect our children they should be given longer sentences and tagged on release for live, this way the police will always know where they are.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
